description.@en: You claim a soul for the blood god, damning them to eternal torment at the hands of the Abyssal Prince of Pleasure.

data.distance: Distance:Any one person you can touch

criticalFailure.@en: Critical Failure:Refusal of the blood god takes a wearisome toll upon you. For three nights hence, your Peril Condition Track may only recover to Imperiled as if you were resting in an unsafe place (as noted in Chapter 9: Hazards & Healing).

criticalSuccess.@en: Critical Success:As above, but you can affect a living person who is suffering from any kind of Injury.

effect.@en: Effect:After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch (providing they are already Slain!) is unable to be raised from the dead.
